title: Journal of Criminal Law and Criminology
aka: Journal of the American Institute of Criminal Law and Criminology
The Journal of Criminal Law, Criminology, and Police Science

see-also.note: The American Journal of Police Science

additional-note: This publication absorbed the American Journal of Police Science in 1932, and continued for some time afterwards to publish a section with that title.  'Police Science' was also included in this journal's title or subtitle at various points afterwards.
